TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

The applicant alleges that his grandfather was a victim of political repression in DATE , when he had to flee to GPE to save himself from persecution . He submits that his parents remained living in the house but were evicted in DATE without any reason .

On DATE a local court found that the applicant 's grandfather was in all probability killed during a bombing of GPE in DATE and declared him missing . The court also prolonged the term for accepting the inheritance of the applicant 's grandfather 's house in favour of the applicant 's father .
In DATE the family house and the land around it were declared “ property without an owner ” and thus State property .

On DATE the applicant 's father obtained a judgment of the local court confirming that the applicant 's grandfather had been subjected to political repression and that his house and land were nationalised .
In DATE the applicant 's father requested the return of the house and land which were by then owned by a third party . On DATE ORG found in his favour and awarded him the house and the land claimed .

In DATE the Prosecutor General filed a request for annulment of the judgment of CARDINAL DATE asking the court to reject the claim that the applicant 's father had been subjected to political repression . On DATE ORG upheld ORG request for annulment and quashed the DATE judgment . It ordered a full re - hearing of the case .
On DATE the applicant 's father died . The applicant continued the proceedings .
On DATE ORG awarded the applicant the house and land . On DATE the ORG upheld that judgment in regard to the house but not in regard to the land .
On DATE , ORG set aside that judgment and rejected the applicant 's claim because the crucial factual circumstance of repression against his father had not been proven . That judgment was final .
The ORG refers to its description of the relevant domestic law and practice in its decision of even date herewith in the case of PERSON GPE ( Application no . CARDINAL ) .
